title: Sophia: That Moment When the Glory of God Shines Thru the Universe (Michael Martin, Author & Farmer)
description:
Michael Martin of The Center for Sophiological Studies tells his story,
reveals his biodynamic farming secrets and discusses faith, community, worship, marriage and Sophia.

Michael Martin, author of:
Sophia in Exile
The Chemical Wedding of Christian Rosenkreutz
Transfiguration
The Submerged Reality
The Incarnation of the Poetic Word
The Heavenly Country
and other books, all available at Amazon & Barnes & Noble
Editor of
JESUS THE IMAGINATION: A Journal of Spiritual Revolution
https://www.thecenterforsophiologicalstudies.com/books
Here’s the link for the Tam Lyn folk alley session
https://youtu.be/c3yTEUnyYDA 
--
